content:
A phbanker today got  a question from someone he called about changing her email that she have the campaign:

"Waiting on the debrief now and wanted to doublecheck with a Mod: I spoke to woman planning to attend that may have given a misspelled email address her sign-up form. Is there any way to pass along her corrected info so she can receive her RSVP email?'

I told him she could sign up again with the correct email, but I'm sure there is a better answer.
Iâ€™m not sure about a way to change an email address.  I too would recommend signing up again using the correct address.
That is what I would say too. Sign-up again with correct email.
